dct_title_s: Caerte vande Zee-Custen van Acason eñ Biscaiẽ met heure havenen eñ opdoeninghe vã Landenn eñ geberchten = Oræ maritimæ Acasonæ et Biscaiæ utrorumque et portuum et apparitionum diligens descriptio
dct_description_sm: doer Lucas Ianß Wagenaer ; Ioãnes à Doetecũ, f.
2 bar scales on map, given in "Hispanica mili. = Spaensche mÿlen" and "Germanica mila. = Duÿtzsche mÿlen."
Shows topography, vegetation, coastline, drainage, shoals, depths, anchorages, settlements (including ports).
3 profile views: Opdoeninghe van Biscaien tußchen Facies Biscaiæ ... -- Verthoninghe van Biscaien tußchen Otera ende Castro ... -- Verthoninghe tußchen eñ Laredo.
Appears in Waghenaer's Spieghel der Zeevaerdt, Leiden:Christophe Plantin, 1584-1588.
